form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title: Alien Employment Certification Form, Form Number: 306.878

full_text: (10) FOR DEPARTMENT USE ONLY: 88 IND. CODE OCC. TITLE Maid, General (Dom. Serv. OCC. CODE 306.878 21. NAME OF JOB OFFERED 22. NUMBER OPENINGS TO BE 23. DAILY WORK SCHEDULE (HOURS) FILLED 'Live-in' Cook/Housekeeper One 9 24. TOTAL HOURS PER WEEK 25. RATE OF PAY 26. IF THE JOB IS UNIONIZED, GIVE NAME AND NUMBER OF LOCAL $200 per month plus 50 room and board N/A 27. OCCUPATIONAL TITLE OF PERSON WHO WILL BE ALIEN'S 28. TYPE AND DEGREE OF SUPERVISION 29. NUMBER OF OTHER EM- ALIEN WILL RECEIVE PLOYEES ALIEN WILL IMMEDIATE SUPERVISOR SUPERVISE Housewife Minimum None 30. DESCRIBE FULLY THE JOB TO BE PERFORMED, INCLUDING DUTIES, WORKING CONDITIONS, AND EQUIPMENT OPERATED. All general housework - laundry, ironing - all cooking. 31. STATE IN DETAIL THE EDUCATION AND TRAINING REQUIRED FOR PROFICIENCY IN JOB. (Specify degrees and major fields of study re- quired. Specify apprenticeship. trade school or other training required). Minimum education only required for this unskilled work - one year's experience is all that is required. 32. STATE MINIMUM EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENTS OF JOB. INDICATE ACCEPTABLE EXPERIENCE IN RELATED JOBS. - As question 31 above - 33. DESCRIBE SKILLS, KNOWLEDGES AND ABILITIES REQUIRED FOR PROFICIENCY IN JOB. - As question 31 above- 34. SPECIFY ANY OTHER SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS SUCH AS LANGUAGES, LICENSES, PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS. Good health - able to pass physical exam - language requirement - able to understand and interpret instructions from English speaking employer. 35.
